metadata.Title: CVE-2021-46784 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Denial of Service in Gopher Processing

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2021-46784` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

squid - 4.13-10ubuntu5.1
squid-cgi - 4.13-10ubuntu5.1
squid-common - 4.13-10ubuntu5.1
squid-openssl - 4.13-10ubuntu5.1
squid-purge - 4.13-10ubuntu5.1
squidclient - 4.13-10ubuntu5.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: squid package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.13-10ubuntu5.1').
